title: Gamification-Enhanced Science Project-Based Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic scientific concepts and fundamental smartphone usage skills
context.additional_context: A science education enhancement program for working professionals, incorporating gamification elements to motivate learning and encourage sustained participation

learning_goals: Learners can achieve over 80% success in self-directed goal-setting during science projects using gamification elements (points, badges, leaderboards, etc.)
Learners can maintain 90%+ participation rates in PBL team activities using smartphone-based collaboration tools
Learners can propose three or more creative approaches to science problem-solving based on gamified learning experiences

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
